```{r z_score with moving X,echo = F,comment = NA}
n = 10
mu = 0 
sd = 1
saveGIF_simple(for (moving_x in seq(-3,3,0.2)) { # mu = 0, sigma = 1, n = 100
  # set the range of x 
  x = seq(-3,3,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  p_value = round_simple(pnorm(-abs(moving_x)),4)
  z_score = (moving_x - mu)/(sd/sqrt(n))
  text_p_value = glue('p = {p_value}')
  text_Z_score = paste('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(moving_x,2),' -  0}{1/\\sqrt{100}}$ = ', round_simple(z_score,2))
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(moving_x,moving_x), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship Between Z score & Sample Mean Distribution',
         subtitle = 'Changing X',
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -2.3, y = 0.45, label = TeX(text_Z_score)) + 
    # delete the comment to show p_value
    #annotate(geom = 'text',x = -1, y = 0.45, label = text_p_value) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot5_moving_X_with_z_score.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```

```{r z_score with changing sd,echo = F,comment = NA}
fix_X = 1.5
mu = 0
n = 10
saveGIF_simple(loop_object = for (sd in seq(1,5,0.2)) {
  x = seq(-7,7,0.1)
  y = dnorm(x,mean = 0,sd = sd)
  plot2_data_in_loop = as.data.frame(cbind(x, y))
  z_score = (fix_X - mu)/(sd/sqrt(n))
  text_p_value = paste('p = ', round_simple(pnorm(-abs(fix_X),sd = sd),4))
  text_Z_score = paste('$\\Z =  \\frac{',round_simple(fix_X,2),' -  0}{',sd,'/\\sqrt{100}}$ = ',round_simple(fix_X/sd,2))
  P_Value_text = paste('p = ', p_value)
  plot_ = plot2_data_in_loop %>% 
    ggplot(data =.,aes(x = x,y = y)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_line(data = data.frame(x = c(fix_X,fix_X), y = c(0,0.4)),color = 'red') + 
    labs(title = 'Relationship Between Z score & Sample Mean Distribution',
         subtitle = TeX(paste0('Changing $\\sigma$')),
         y = 'Frequency') + 
    theme_classic() + 
    annotate(geom = 'text',x = -5.5, y = 0.45, label = TeX(text_Z_score)) + 
    # delete the comment to show p_value text
    #annotate(geom = 'text',x = -2.5, y = 0.45, label = text_p_value) + 
    lims(y = c(0,0.5))
      
  print(plot(plot_))},
  movie_name = 'Plot5_moving_sd_with_z_score.gif', 
  clone_repository_path = clone_repository_path,
  loop_speed = 0.4, loop_number = 1)
```
